function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Introduction of wearable pulse oximeter devices","Impact":"Increased reliance on self-monitoring could lead to delayed or inaccurate diagnosis of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Encouraging users to seek professional medical advice in case of abnormalities in readings, and ensuring devices are accurate and reliable.","Technologies":"Improved sensor accuracy and calibration, integration with telemedicine services.","People":"General public, individuals with respiratory symptoms.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, device manufacturers."},{"Description":"Use of respiratory rate monitoring for disease evaluation","Impact":"Inaccurate measurement or misinterpretation of respiratory rate could lead to missed or delayed diagnosis of respiratory diseases, including contagious ones.","Mitigation":"Education on correct usage and interpretation of respiratory rate readings, development of reliable sensor technology.","Technologies":"Improvements in sensor accuracy and calibration, development of user-friendly interfaces for data interpretation.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers.","Owner":"Medical device manufacturers, health education organizations."},{"Description":"Cough and lung sound monitoring for contagious disease symptoms","Impact":"Failure to monitor and detect cough and lung sounds could result in delayed identification and isolation of contagious disease cases.","Mitigation":"Development of accurate and reliable sensor technology for cough and lung sound monitoring, integration with digital health platforms for real-time analysis.","Technologies":"Advanced sound and cough recognition algorithms, integration with telemedicine platforms.","People":"Individuals with respiratory symptoms, healthcare providers.","Owner":"Healthcare technology companies, device manufacturers."}]}
